alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 7:38PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Kings, west central Tulare and southeastern Fresno Counties through 830 PM PDT... At 737 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over London moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Visalia, Tulare, Reedley, Dinuba, Orosi, Farmersville, Exeter, Woodlake, Ivanhoe, Traver, Cutler, London and Goshen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley
